info.name: Candy Camels
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

"1", "2", and "3" tokens by Mark W (https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgamedesigner/114937/mark-a-wilson), released to the Public Domain under CC0.
The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0:
* Camel Head: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/camel-head.html
* Spades: https://game-icons.net/1x1/skoll/spades.html
* Hearts: https://game-icons.net/1x1/skoll/hearts.html
* Diamonds: https://game-icons.net/1x1/skoll/diamonds.html
* Clubs: https://game-icons.net/1x1/skoll/clubs.html
* Round Star: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/round-star.html
The following graphics are from https://www.svgrepo.com/ and are used under the MIT license: * Thin circle vector: https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/509054/circle-thin * Circle large vector: https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/326168/circle-large The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license: * Palm Tree: https://www.freepik.com/icon/palm-tree_12882150
info.description: Keep your camel caravans healthy by reaching oases and watering holes through the desert!
info.similarAwards:

fields.text: You're about to calculate all players tokens. Are you sure?

gameStartRoutine.note: Select all editable labels in the room

thenRoutine.notes: In a 3p game, remove 4 camels of each color
In a 2p game, remove 8 camels of each color
In a 3p game, remove 4 camels of each color
In a 2p game, remove 8 camels of each color

river-B-Routine.notes: Loop through each point token space; if it's empty then populate it with the remaining watering hole tokens

river-A-Routine.notes: Loop through each of five random oasis spaces and deal 1 oasis token to it
Loop through each watering hole space and deal 1 watering hole token to it
Loop through each point token space; if it's empty then populate it with the remaining watering hole tokens

mountain-B-Routine.notes: Loop through each point token space; if it's empty then populate it with the remaining watering hole tokens

mountain-A-Routine.notes: Loop through each of five random oasis spaces and deal 1 oasis token to it
Loop through each watering hole space and deal 1 watering hole token to it
Loop through each point token space; if it's empty then populate it with the remaining watering hole tokens

fields.text: You're about to reveal scores. Are you sure?
You're about to hide scores. Are you sure?
